Click the NEXT button to start the course.

About this Course

This course uses video and sound. Use of speakers or a headset is recommended.

Hearing-impaired users and those without a sound device can turn on closed captions for the video and motion screen capture content by clicking the Closed-Captioned button on the left. Then click the NEXT button to proceed.

Visually impaired students using screen reader software (such as Jaws) should click the Screen Reader button on the left to ensure that they are directed to content that makes the best use of this technology. Then click the NEXT button to proceed.
